titleStmt.title: The Deposition of Mr. William Carstares when he was examined before the Lords of secret committee, given in by him and renewed upon oath upon the 22 of December 1684, in presence of the Lords of His Majesty's Privy-Council
titleStmt.author: Carstares, William, 1649-1715.
England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His Most Sacred Majesty, and reprinted at London by Tho. Newcomb for Susanna Forester ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
